content: ü§ñ I‚Äôll admit it: I use AI tools to help me draft emails and DMs.Not for everything. But when it‚Äôs sensitive, awkward, or high-stakes?üññ Call in the Borg.Am I ceding my humanity to the robots? Or am I just acknowledging that evolutionarily none of us was meant to:üß† Jump between projects every 15 minutes üë• Spend all day engaging only with people we've never met IRL  üìù Organically craft the perfect, not-misinterpret-able messaging on the fly when we barely have time to refill our Nalgenes between meetings hashtag#hydrationgoalsHere‚Äôs the thing: ‚úçÔ∏è I still tweak and personalize every message. I‚Äôm not outsourcing my voice‚ÄîI‚Äôm allowing myself to speak at the pace of business...ü§û ... I think? üò¨ So drop your vote:  Am I being creepy or pragmatic?  hashtag#AIWriting hashtag#CommunicationFatigue hashtag#DigitalOverload hashtag#WeAretheBorg
